tool_description: Generates comprehensive comparisons between carriers across multiple performance and cost dimensions, providing rankings and recommendations.

performance_metrics_id.description: Reference ID for calculated performance metrics

cost_analysis_id.description: Reference ID for cost efficiency analysis

quality_scores_id.description: Reference ID for service quality scores

weighting_scheme.description: Weighting approach: equal, cost_focused, service_focused, or custom

custom_weights.description: Custom weights for comparison criteria (if weighting_scheme is custom)

include_recommendations.description: Whether to include carrier selection recommendations

comparison_format.description: Output format: summary, detailed, or executive

error_messages: Invalid data reference: One or more provided analysis IDs cannot be found or have expired.
Invalid comparison criteria: Supported criteria include cost, speed, reliability, quality, coverage, capacity.
Invalid weighting scheme: Use equal, cost_focused, service_focused, or custom.
Custom weights mismatch: Number of custom weights must match number of comparison criteria and sum to 100.
Invalid comparison format: Use summary, detailed, or executive.
Insufficient data for comparison: Not enough data available for meaningful carrier comparison.
usage: Provide all three analysis IDs and specify comparison_criteria. Choose weighting_scheme and optionally customize other parameters for tailored carrier comparisons.

carrier_rankings.description: Carriers ranked by overall performance score

comparison_matrix.description: Detailed comparison matrix showing all carriers and criteria

top_performers.description: Top performing carriers in each category

recommendations.description: Strategic recommendations for carrier selection and mix
